customColumn1.label: Edit
customColumn1.onClick:
{{navigateTo('Edit job',{
		"_id": Table1.selectedRow._id,
		"job_title": Table1.selectedRow.job_title,
		"department": Table1.selectedRow.department,
		"job_type": Table1.selectedRow.job_type,
		"skills": Table1.selectedRow.skills,
		"experience": Table1.selectedRow.experience,
		"min_salary": Table1.selectedRow.min_salary,
		"max_salary": Table1.selectedRow.max_salary,
		"currency": Table1.selectedRow.currency,
		"company": Table1.selectedRow.company,
			"companyId": Table1.selectedRow.company_id,
		"description": Table1.selectedRow.description,
		"close": Table1.selectedRow.close
	},)}}
